item.description: This will be a fun night and opportunity to meet old and new friends.  They have delicious food and a nice atmosphere.  Come join us for a fun evening!  To reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 220 Main Street:  I‑91 to left Exit 22S (Rt. 9S), continue 5.5 miles, turn right onto Washington Street (Rt. 66), at light on Main St., turn left, facility down on left at a corner.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Let's Eat Out
